General.Name: Delta Technologies Nyrt
General.Description: Delta Technologies Nyrt. operates as an application service provider (ASP) that develops and operates database-based Internet, wireless application protocol (WAP), and SMS applications. The company's products include Webgyár, an online content management system; and IVY PortalPrint, which is Microsoft .NET based online publishing and content management solution for creating online magazines and Web portals. It also offers custom development, co-location, and consulting services. It has strategic partnerships with Oracle, Nokia, HP, Microsoft, and Budapest Stock Exchange. Delta Technologies Nyrt. is based in Budapest, Hungary.
